frontmatter.title: Sprawlopolis + Expansions Review (Solo Mode)
frontmatter.description: Sprawlopolis is a fantastic city builder in solo with high replayability.

frontmatter.title: Ragemore Review
frontmatter.description: Ragemore initially feels good but ultimately lacks depth and variety.

frontmatter.title: Iron Helm Review
frontmatter.description: Iron Helm is a fantastic solo dungeon crawler in a fairly small package.

frontmatter.title: Death Valley + Expansion Review (Solo Mode)
frontmatter.description: Death Valley provides great tableau building in a small package but has limited replayability.

frontmatter.title: SpaceShipped Review
frontmatter.description: SpaceShipped is a great space merchant adventure that is let down by extreme randomness.

frontmatter.title: Fishing Lessons Review
frontmatter.description: Fishing Lessons is a satisfying programming game that has limited replayability.
